revision.text: Possibly: Philosophical essays on ... the principles of mechanics ... phaenomena of air and water ... the nature of the Aurora Borealis, and the tails of comets, by Hugh Hamilton. (Dublin, Printed by W. Sleater, 1766). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/28909946
